name: Let's Balls!
description:
Let's Balls! - this is an exciting casual arcade game with endless gameplay.

Moving quickly, be on the alert by controlling two balls, dodge obstacles in time and collect crystals!

You can control the balls by rotating your finger.

Uniqueness of Let’s Balls!:
- Simple and intuitive interface, easy operation;
- High-quality graphics, and atmospheric soundtrack;
- The gameplay is interesting and fun, which become harder as you move through the tunnel;
- This game is for everyone who wants to stretch their brains and test their reflexes.

Collect crystals to change the style of the balls or the game background.
Try to play as long as possible to get more points.

Let's Balls! - this is a great way to relieve stress, wherever you are! Relax and you're in a unique arcade Let’s Balls!
